name: NeoGAF Lite
description:
An alternative and lite interpretation of the theme on NeoGAF.
Works perfect with both the light and dark theme on NeoGAF.
Check out the screenshots.

What it does:
 - smaller fonts
 - less padding
 - fixes oddly placed elements
 - extras

This is a work in progress.

Note: This does not remove any ads. They're simply removed for the screenshots to reduce its size.
